title: Drawing, 1879
medium: Brush and watercolor, white gouache, graphite on thin gray paper.
markings: Stamped on recto, lower left: Museum for the Arts of Decoration Cooper Union [Lugt 457d]
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at upper left: The Tetons, Idaho; at lower left corner: 33 (in a circle) [erased]; and again, at lower center: 12
description: Horizontal view across a flat river valley showing a mountain range in blue in the distance with a group of conifer trees suggested at right. The intermediate ranges are violet and blue and the water is green.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, 1879.
1879. Brush and watercolor, white gouache, graphite on thin gray paper.. Gift of Thomas Moran. 1917-17-33.
